DEMO_114_MSG_010: ̂By receiving this transmission, you're indicating that you've safely arrived at the Centre Building's control center...
DEMO_114_MSG_020: ̂You have only just begun your journey as a Monster Master... just as you've just started re-learning about our world.
DEMO_114_MSG_030:
̂There is still much for you to learn... However, for the 
moment I just need you to listen to the following...
DEMO_114_MSG_040: ̂I thought if I had simply told you the truth about the condition of our world, the shock would've been too much to believe...
DEMO_114_MSG_050:
̂This is why... I left this message, recorded here for you. 
It is one of your long-since-lost memories...
ā
DEMO_114_MSG_060:
̂Watch it... take it all in... and most importantly... 
try to remember what once was...
